CustomField.formula: IF(KPI_Total_Lifetime_Spend__c = 0, "", IF(KPI_Total_Lifetime_Spend__c < 100, "£0-£100", IF(KPI_Total_Lifetime_Spend__c < 500, "£100-£500", IF(KPI_Total_Lifetime_Spend__c < 1000, "£500-£1000", IF(KPI_Total_Lifetime_Spend__c < 2000, "£1000-£2000", IF(KPI_Total_Lifetime_Spend__c < 5000, "£2000-£5000", IF(KPI_Total_Lifetime_Spend__c < 10000, "£5000-£10000", IF(KPI_Total_Lifetime_Spend__c < 20000, "£10000-£20000", IF(KPI_Total_Lifetime_Spend__c < 50000, "£20000-£50000", IF(KPI_Total_Lifetime_Spend__c < 100000, "£50000-£100000", IF(KPI_Total_Lifetime_Spend__c < 200000, "£100000-£200000", IF(KPI_Total_Lifetime_Spend__c >= 200000, "£200000+","Error" ))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Krux Total Lifetime Spend
